name: Plant Grid
description:
You only need the EXE file to download. The ZIP file is just full of backup files.

Simple plant game.

Controls:

Space - cycle between plants 

Left Mouse Button - set down a plant on the grid 

Right Mouse Button - delete plants from the grid

Future developments (if any) aim to: add a customizable, resizable grid, spin the preview image, add more plants, add a rotate plant button, add half blocks
